MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsOnDeviceRecognitionAvailable(class Android.Content.Context context) cil managed

Docs.param: with which on-device SpeechRecognizer will be created
Docs.summary: Checks whether an on-device speech recognition service is available on the system.
Docs.returns: true if on-device recognition is available, false otherwise

Docs.param: with which SpeechRecognizer will be created
